import sys

def main():
    a, b = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    print(abs(a-b))
if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


import sys

def main():
    a = sys.stdin.readline()
    print(a)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

print(input().replace("2017", "2018"))


A, B = map(int, input().split())
print(A - B if B < A else A)


A, B = map(int, input().split())
if A > B:
    print(A - B)
else:
    print(B - A)


A, B = map(int, input().split())
print(A - B if B < A else 0 if B > A else 1)
